descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=7][I][B]Breezehome Nordic House V 3.1[/B][/I][/SIZE][/FONT]


[B][I][FONT=\"Times New Roman\"][SIZE=\"6\"][COLOR=\"Silver\"]Please Endorse this file if you like it[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/I][/B]


[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img443/8233/bnh1.jpg[/IMG]


[B][I][FONT=\"Times New Roman\"][SIZE=\"6\"][COLOR=\"Silver\"]Watch the house Video in Video section of this Mod[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/I][/B]



This house is totally remade, if you used my previouse version you will know that this is 
a total convertion of the Vanilla breezehome house...


The previous version add some bugs that are now hopefully corrected,

the house haves nothing that reminds the older version and as before
haves a total interior constumised rooms.

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img845/805/2012092000005.jpg[/IMG]


[B][I][SIZE=\"6\"][FONT=\"Times New Roman\"][COLOR=\"Silver\"] Breezehome Nordic House V 3.1   Content Notes[/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][/I][/B]

[B][I][SIZE=\"6\"][FONT=\"Times New Roman\"][COLOR=\"Silver\"] Attention[/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][/I][/B]


[B][I][SIZE=\"6\"][FONT=\"Times New Roman\"][COLOR=\"Silver\"]The house features will work after you purchase all house decorations and fetures in the game. [/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][/I][/B]


This house haves the same rooms as the vanilla version but every room has been 
redecorated, plus now you will have a new entrance to a first bacement rooms that
gives you a new bathing area plus a smithing room plus the enchant and Alchem room,

om the pool area you will find a new door that leads you to the secound basement
were you will find the throne room and war room and the weapons room...


[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img20/9346/2012091900011.jpg[/IMG]



 [B][I][FONT=\"Times New Roman\"][SIZE=\"6\"][COLOR=\"Silver\"]Important Notes[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/I][/B]


load out order on data files management.


I found out that if you load the house or any Mod of breezehome at first or midle data files table loadout 
the house will load with stuff from the vanilla version scatered all over including the fire on tha floor shield rack that is not there anymore
etc....

to prevent this from happening I found that if you put the file at the last of all in the data management window it will load
the house properly without any of this things and as the Mod comes...


Also I found that the house haves some active memory that you can not change ( at least as I know ) that prevents you
to develop the house more then this in this Mod, what I mean is the for example I wanted to had some banners over the throne
room and some benches and could not cause of continued house CTD, and when deleted this the house worked great...

...So untill this is solved or I discover a way to turn it around The house will be like this...


 [B][I][FONT=\"Times New Roman\"][SIZE=\"6\"][COLOR=\"Silver\"]Important[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/I][/B]


Remember that this file should always be at last in your load out order even when you 
download more files you have to always move this house to last in the load order...

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img441/2296/2012092000024.jpg[/IMG]

[B][I][FONT=\"Times New Roman\"][SIZE=\"6\"][COLOR=\"Silver\"]Install instrutions[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/I][/B]

Before install do this:

Remove everything from your house containers such as Chests, Bookcases etc...

House intall

uppack the file and extract the data folder into the Skyrim directory located at:

C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim


Thanks for your time and please endorse it at  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/


Bullfye                [/CENTER]
author: Bullfye
